addon.name: enum34
addon.extension:
enum34 is the new Python stdlib enum module available in Python 3.4 backported for previous versions of Python from 2.4 to 3.3. tested on 2.6, 2.7, and 3.3+ Python stdlib enum module from Python 3.4 backported enum34 is the new Python stdlib enum module available in Python 3.4 backported for previous versions of Python from 2.4 to 3.3. tested on 2.6, 2.7, and 3.3+ all BSD License https://pypi.org/project/enum34/ https://bitbucket.org/stoneleaf/enum34/src/default/
